data.title: Where is Beirut, Lebanon on Map Lat Long Coordinates
data.meta_description: Where is Beirut, Lebanon on map with latitude and longitude gps coordinates are given in both decimal degrees and DMS format, see where Beirut, Lebanon is located on the map.
data.text:
Beirut, Lebanon

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 33.888630, 35.495480.

Beirut is the largest and the capital city of Lebanon located in the central coastal part of the country. It is situated on a small peninsula overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and has a triangular shape of its municipality. The total area of the city is estimated to be close to 8 square miles. From its southern and southeastern parts, the city area is protected by the Lebanon Mountains, namely the mounts of Al-Musaytibah and Al-Ashrafieh. The city has quite a long coastal line which is almost 18 miles long and is mainly covered by rocky shores with a few quite nice and comfortable sandy beaches. Beirut can be found about 70 miles northwest of the city of Damascus, about 140 miles north of the city of Tel Aviv, and about 115 miles southeast from the shores of the island of Cyprus.

The downtown of the city is located in the northern part of the municipal area, and there are quite a few central districts of Beirut like Al Marfa'a, Majidiyeh, Ain Al Mraiseh, Al Zarif, Al Kantari, Patriarcat, Bachoura, Mar Maroun, Remeil, Al Hikmeh, and others. The outskirts of Beirut municipality include such districts and small towns like Mala'ab Al Baladi, UNESCO District, Qasqas, Palais De Justice, etc. A large satellite city of Bourj Hammoud is situated in the western part of the municipal area. Beirut is a historic city, a key industrial and business spot of the country, with attractions like the National Museum of Beirut, the Robert Mouawad Private Museum, Sursock Museum, Beirut Souks shopping mall, Church of St. Gregory the Illuminator, and so on.
